descriptionHtml:
[Note]
Mod name changed. (from \"Composite Bow\" to \"Reinforced Bow\")
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Change Log]
Version 2.0
 - Changed texture.
 - Changed performance.
 - Added two new bows.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Performance]
Iron-reinforced Bow
Value: 130
Weight: 7
Damage: 10
Speed: 0.9
Crafting Category: Iron

Steel-reinforced Bow
Value: 480
Weight: 10
Damage: 14
Speed: 0.8
Crafting Category: Steel
(Required Perk: Advanced Armor)

Ebony-reinforced Bow
Value: 2000
Weight: 16
Damage: 19
Speed: 0.7
Crafting Category: Ebony
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Data]
meshes\\weapons\\reinforcedbow\\bowebony.nif (327KB)
meshes\\weapons\\reinforcedbow\\bowiron.nif (327KB)
meshes\\weapons\\reinforcedbow\\bowsteel.nif (327KB)
textures\\weapons\\reinforcedbow\\bowebony.dds (2048x2048, 2731KB)
textures\\weapons\\reinforcedbow\\bowiron.dds (2048x2048, 2731KB)
textures\\weapons\\reinforcedbow\\bowsteel.dds (2048x2048, 2731KB)
Reinforced Bow.esp (3KB)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Form ID]
xx000d62 (Iron-reinforced Bow)
xx000d63 (Steel-reinforced Bow)
xx000d64 (Ebony-reinforced Bow)
author: Bellwood2206
